caption.title: Neutralizing activity of RRV mAbs against RRV strain T48.
caption.p: Red circles represent percent neutralization relative to control at different antibody concentrations. Logistic curves are indicated by solid lines, and 95% credible intervals are indicated by dashed lines. A line at 100% neutralization highlights mAbs that completely neutralize. Multiple experiments were performed in triplicate, and the best fit curve is shown.
Click here for additional data file.
